verses.name: 1 Samuel 14:31
verses.text: And they smote the Philistines that day from Michmash to Aijalon: and the people were very faint.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 14:32
verses.text: And the people flew upon the spoil, and took sheep, and oxen, and calves, and slew them on the ground: and the people did eat them with the blood.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 14:33
verses.text: Then they told Saul, saying, Behold, the people sin against the Lord, in that they eat with the blood. And he said, Ye have transgressed: roll a great stone unto me this day.
